name: cliOS
short_description:
Modern command-line based Linux Desktop distribution for students and geeks. The purpose of cliOS is mainly bringing an easy to use cli system that offers a lot af modern functionality like mouse clicks, text-selection and copy&pasting. This makes cliOS very usable as a desktop OS for daily usage. More nice features are several menu-based desktop-replacements that help you out a lot when it comes to remembering those really hard to remember commands and options. 

cliOS makes learning Linux shell commands not only easy but really fun too. The system is also very usable for blind persons and works way better with screenreaders than any GUI desktop environment I know of and the greatest thing about is is offcource that it's Free and Open Source so you will always be able to enjoy it the way You like it. 

New Release Will Be Comming Shortly!!! Check our blog or subscribe to our mailinglist to stay updated!!!
summary: Modern command-line based Linux Desktop distribution.
